output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
  n = 1000
  m = 100
  
  X = rnorm(n, mean=0, sd=1)
  Y = rexp(n, rate=1)
  
  for (i in (n-m):n) {
    Y[i] = Y[i] + X[i]
  }
  
  Ri = rank(X)
  Si = rank(Y)
  
  #Spirman
  alpha = 0.1
  za = qnorm(1-(alpha/2), mean=0, sd=1)
  
  ps = 1 - 6/(n*(n^2 - 1))*sum((Ri-Si)^2)
  cat("ps = ", ps, "\n")
  
  if (sqrt(n)*abs(ps) > za) {
    cat("H0 rejected with alpha = ", alpha, "\n")
  } else {
    cat("H0 accepted with alpha = ", alpha, "\n")
  }
  
  
```
